abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the project is to
            support the efforts of the government to improve the
            efficiency of financial and human resources management in
            the Central Administration.  It will provide long- and
            short-term foreign and local consultancies, computer
            hardware and software, office supplies, vehicles, and
            training of local staff in support of four components.
            Under the financial management component, the project will
            assist the government to revise the budget model according
            to program classification, and adapt the present accounting,
            cash management and financial reporting systems to the
            revised budget model.  Under the program management
            component, it will introduce in selected ministries and in
            statutory bodies critical to the functioning of those
            ministries, a corporate planning methodology that will
            assist managers to define the institutions' objectives
            and priorities, identify relevant programs, rationalize the
            relationship between the ministries and key statutory
            bodies, and monitor the progress of program implementation.
            Under the computer component, the project will set up a
            financial management information system to support the
            budgeting, accounting and cash management process in
            selected ministries.  A human resources management
            information system will also be introduced.  A training
            component will provide courses in corporate planning,
            program budgeting, accounting and computer skills.
